Token.Abstract: Protocol to receive events related to remote peer messages.
Called upon receiving a socket message (Signalling).
Token.Declaration: - (void)connection:(nonnull SKYLINKConnection *)connection didReceiveServerMessage:(null_unspecified id)message isPublic:(BOOL)isPublic timeStamp:(long long)timeStamp remotePeerId:(null_unspecified NSString *)remotePeerId

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: User defined message. May be an NSString, NSDictionary or NSArray.

Parameter.Name: isPublic
Parameter.Abstract: Flag to specify whether the message was a broadcast.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer.

Token.Abstract: Called upon receiving a P2P message (DataChannel).
Token.Declaration: - (void)connection:(nonnull SKYLINKConnection *)connection didReceiveP2PMessage:(null_unspecified id)message isPublic:(BOOL)isPublic timeStamp:(long long)timeStamp remotePeerId:(null_unspecified NSString *)remotePeerId

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: User defined message. May be an NSString, NSDictionary or NSArray.

Parameter.Name: isPublic
Parameter.Abstract: Flag to specify whether the message was a broadcast.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer.

Token.Abstract: Called upon receiving binary data on data channel.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the remote peer.
